text.div:
PositiveNegativeVS ValueSet

Interpretation of a test result as positive, negative or equivocal. Equivalent values to LOINC LL2009-0.

name: PositiveNegativeVS
description: Interpretation of a test result as positive, negative or equivocal. Equivalent values to LOINC LL2009-0.

concept.display: Equivocal (qualifier value). Equivocal represents a borderline value, too close to call; for example, a value very close to a cut-off between positive and negative
Indeterminate (qualifier value). Indeterminate means the results were uninterpretable, or cannot be determined; technical issues prevented obtaining a valid result.
